title: do so, with the previous approval of the Government, provided that the combination of such different uses conform to these Regulations and the permissible use in the zone in which the site falls
clause_text: do so, with the previous approval of the Government, provided that the combination of such different uses conform to these Regulations and the permissible use in the zone in which the site falls. Provided further that this shall not apply to any site being developed for education, wherein a branch of a bank/ATM may be allowed,
